plentry.pd: The area to display the watermark image in landscape mode. See for details.
When the adaptation mode of the watermark is , it is used to set the area of the watermark image in landscape mode. See for details.

The area to display the watermark image in landscape mode. This parameter contains the following members.
x: The horizontal position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
y: The vertical position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
width: The width (pixels) of the watermark area.
height: The height (pixels) of the watermark area.
The area to display the watermark image in portrait mode. See for details.
When the adaptation mode of the watermark is , it is used to set the area of the watermark image in portrait mode. See for details.

The area to display the watermark image in portrait mode. This parameter contains the following members.
x: The horizontal position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
y: The vertical position of the watermark relative to the upper left corner.
width: The width (pixels) of the watermark area.
height: The height (pixels) of the watermark area.
When the watermark adaptation mode is , this parameter is used to set the watermark coordinates. See for details.
The adaptation mode of the watermark. See for details.
